prompt: A modern office environment with natural lighting, featuring a diverse group of people casually interacting near a wall decorated in deep blue tones, with subtle gradient shifts from blue to deep blue. The wall has a soft, pixelated texture effect, creating a visually interesting but understated background. The composition is clean and uncluttered, with open space in the foreground suitable for overlaying content. No screens, text, posters, or abstract shapes present.

A professional Asian woman standing in a bright, modern office, smiling confidently. She is dressed in stylish business attire, surrounded by tasteful contemporary office furniture and natural light. The background features a few colleagues engaged in relaxed conversation, adding a sense of energy and collaboration to the scene. The overall mood is positive and welcoming, with a subtle variety in office plants and decorative elements to create visual interest.

A professional Black man in sharp business attire seated at a modern desk, looking satisfied. The workspace features clean lines, soft neutral colors, and large windows letting in natural light. Colleagues can be seen in the background, some working at their desks and others chatting by a coffee area, providing a sense of activity and teamwork. The environment is stylish yet approachable, with varying desk accessories and greenery for added warmth.

A professional Latina woman in a contemporary workspace, appearing focused and successful. She is seated at a desk with elegant office decor and subtle pops of color from indoor plants or artwork. The background includes coworkers collaborating in small groups, creating a dynamic and productive atmosphere. The scene is well-lit and inviting, with slight variations in furniture arrangement and decor to maintain consistency while offering visual variety.

A diverse group of people collaborating around a modern wooden table in a bright, open office space. The team includes individuals of various ages, ethnicities, and genders, all engaged in an energetic group discussion. Natural light streams through large windows, indoor plants add a touch of greenery, and comfortable contemporary furniture creates a welcoming atmosphere. Papers, notebooks, and coffee cups are scattered on the table, and people gesture animatedly as they exchange ideas.

A professional knowledge worker standing in a bright, modern office environment, smiling confidently. The background includes natural lighting, indoor plants, and tasteful contemporary furniture. The worker is dressed in smart business casual attire. Subtle variations in pose and clothing style across images, with diverse ages and ethnicities represented.
